events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me well and I no longer need it.
The issue was identified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning wanting their money back for an item that doesn't fit.
The case was assigned to support agent Emily to handle the refund inquiry and assist the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 845723, and yes, the jacket is still new, unused, and all original tags are attached.
Thank you! I’ve initiated your refund request. Please return the jacket within the next 10 days using the prepaid shipping label we will email you.
That sounds great, thanks for making the process easy. I appreciate your quick help with this refund.
Your refund case is now open and the return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the package, the refund will be processed promptly.
Checking in to confirm if you were able to send back the jacket and if everything went smoothly with your refund process.
Yes, I returned the jacket three days ago, and I have already received the refund on my card. Thanks again for your excellent support.
We’re glad to hear that the refund was successful. We are closing your case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
